scripts.run: ./node_modules/.bin/coffee -j client/public/app.coffee -b --no-header -c client/app/ && jade -P client/app/index.jade -o client/public/ && jade -P client/app/views/ -o client/public/views/ && ./node_modules/.bin/coffee server/app/server.coffee
scripts.start: ./node_modules/.bin/coffee -j client/public/app.coffee -b --no-header -c client/app/ && jade -P client/app/index.jade -o client/public/ && jade -P client/app/views/ -o client/public/views/ && ./node_modules/.bin/forever start -s -c coffee server/app/server.coffee
scripts.stop: ./node_modules/.bin/forever stop -s `./node_modules/.bin/forever list | grep 'server/app/server.coffee' | awk '{ print $2 }' | cut -c2- | rev | cut -c2-`
